```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data= read.csv('familiar_music_database.csv', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#GENRE AND YEAR 
#Y=GENRE COUNT  AND X=YEAR
```

```{r}

#energy and year 

model_1<- lm(data=data, energy~year)
summary(model)

plot_1= ggplot(data=data, aes(x=year, y= energy))+
geom_point()+
geom_abline(intercept = -1.717e+01,slope = 8.986e-03, color= 'red')
plot_1


```


